data.title: Full-time MBA degree at ESB Business School
data.meta_description: The full-time MBA Diploma is ideal preparation for leadership roles in global concerns |AACSB accredited | Find out more now!
data.text:
How to apply

Step 1:

Get the necessary documents together:

Your CV

Letter of motivation (1 page)

Copy of your bachelor’s degree certificate

GMAT Focus 515+, GMAT 550+ or equivalent EA, BAT and GRE (35th percentile) scores or CAT (80th percentile) unless applicant has a business-related bachelor’s or master’s degree. Please make your GMAT or GRE score available to us via your GMAT or GRE account. The GMAT code for ESB Business School is MMB-LX-84. The GRE code for ESB Business School is 2867.

Documentation of minimum two years professional experience

Step 2: Fill out the online application form.

Online application form

Our advice: The earlier you submit your application, the more time you will have in the further application process, e.g. applying for your visa and verifying your documents.

Step 3:

1. Indian https://aps-india.de/, Vietnamese https://vietnam.diplo.de/vn-vi and Chinese https://www.aps.org.cn// applicants must apply for recognition of their first degree with the respective APS authority in their country.

2. ALL applicants with a bachelor’s degree issued outside of Germany, must apply to Studienkolleg Konstanz for recognition of such.

FAQs about the application process

Selection interview

After you have submitted the online application form, and provided you meet the admission requirements, you will receive a proposed date for the selection interview. If the date is not feasible, we will offer you an alternative date.

The selection interview: You will take part in a 30 minute online interview. If you pass the selection interview, you will receive confirmation within a week.

Enrolment

Step 1: Enrol online at Reutlingen University Campus PoRTal and upload the required documents.

ONLINE ENROLMENT

Please switch to the English version on the following (after pressing online elrolment) page (Campus-PoRTal) if necessary. The button is located on the next page in the lower right corner.

You can view the status of your enrolment in the university's Campus PoRTal.

Step 2: Submit the signed application for enrolment together with all supporting documents by post to Reutlingen University. Your application with all the required documents must be received by the enrolment deadline of 15. August.

List of documents:

A high school leaving certificate or equivalent (e. g. A-levels, Abitur, Hochschulreife).

A copy of your first higher education degree (e. g. diploma/bachelor’s). Applicants with a bachelor’s degree from a German institution of higher education, please submit a certified copy and the certificate of exmatriculation.

Indian https://aps-india.de/, Vietnamese https://vietnam.diplo.de/vn-vi and Chinese https://www.aps.org.cn// applicants must apply for recognition of their first degree with the respective APS authority in their country.

ALL applicants with a bachelor’s degree issued outside of Germany, must apply to Studienkolleg Konstanz for recognition of such.

Resumé (CV)

Confirmation of successful selection interview

Proof of level C1 English proficiency undless bachelors´s degree was conducted in English

GMAT 550+, GMAC Executive Assessment (EA) or GRE equivalent (mandatory/ no waivers). Please make your GMAT or GRE score available to us via your GMAT or GRE account. The GMAT code for ESB Business School is MMB-LX-84. The GRE code for ESB Business School is 2867.

Proof of minimum two years professional experience (employment contract, interim reference or employer's confirmation of the duration of the employment relationship).

Applicants from India, China and Vietnam must submit an original certificate from the Academic Evaluation Center (APS)

Copy of valid passport

Electronic notification from a statutory health insurance company in Germany about health insurance status

Please ensure that you include a current email and home address in your application so that we can contact you.

Step 3: Once you have successfully submitted all documents, you will receive an enrolment offer, a list of any outstanding certificates and a fee notification. Pay the first instalment of the tuition fees (€ 5,200) and the semester fee. The transfer must be made by the enrolment deadline on 15 August.

FAQ about applications
